  • Method Details

    • transferNFT

      public String transferNFT(String strURL, String strSenderPrivateKey, String strSenderPublicKey, String strAssetId, String strNewMetadata, String strRecipientPublicKey)
      TransferNFT is the method that transfers a non-fungible token in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      strURL - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      strSenderPrivateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      strSenderPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      strAssetId - Receives the ASSET-ID from the non-fungible token that wants to transfer to another wallet
         (e.g., "095ee8b3a8599fabe61a09c1c046df7b8af3cb4f70b815222daad132988bd67d").
      strNewMetadata - Receives the Metadata Array about the transfer of the non-fungible token in JSON format
         (e.g., "{\"metadata\":[{\"new owner\":\"Agent Alice\",
               \"location\":\"Rio de Janeiro\",
               \"value_btc\":\"2100\",
               \"value_eur\":\"30000000€\"
           }]}").
      strRecipientPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the receiver wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "FNJPJdtuPQYsqHG6tuUjKjqv7SW84U4ipiyyLV2j6MEW").

      Returns:
      Return the TRANSFER-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • registerNFT

      public String registerNFT(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey, String nonFungibleToken)
      RegisterNFT is the method that create a non-fungible token in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a BigChainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the owner wallet in the BigChainDB Network *
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the owner wallet in the BigChainDB Network *
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      nonFungibleToken - Receives the Asset/Metadata Array of the non-fungible token in JSON format
         (e.g., "{\n" +
        " \"asset\":[{\n" +
          " \"name\":\"Meninas\",\n" +
          " \"author\":\"Diego Rodríguez de Silva y Velázquez\",\n" +
          " \"place\":\"Madrid\",\n" +
          " \"year\":\"1656\"}],\n" +
        " \"metadata\":[{\n" +
          " \"location\":\"Madrid\",\n" +
          " \"value_eur\":\"25000000€\",\n" +
          " \"value_btc\":\"2200\",\n" +
          " \"owner\":\"Agent Bob\"}]\n" +
        "}").
      Returns:
      Return the ASSET-ID case every crypto-conditions of CREATE action are fulfilled in BigChainDB Network *
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").
